snippet: A man who ran preschool programs for children with developmental disabilities in New York admitted to stealing more than $2 million meant for special education services.
abstract: Cheon H Park is sentenced to two years in prison after admitting to stealing more than $2 million meant for special education services in plea deal; Park ran preschool programs for children with developmental disabilities in New York.
lead_paragraph: A man who ran preschool programs for children with developmental disabilities in New York admitted to stealing more than $2 million meant for special education services.

headline.main: Preschool Director Is Sentenced to Two Years in Prison
headline.print_headline: Preschool Director Is Going to Prison
